entry.title: My dissertation materials are available on github

link.title: My dissertation materials are available on github

entry.content: The contents of my dissertation, including data, code, and the latex document itself, are or will be made available on github. I’ve benefited immensely from the generosity and openness of other researchers, so I figured I’d do my best to repay the favor as best I could. Reorganizing and cleaning things up is a work in progress, but the goal is to make the analysis reproducible. Feel free to contact me with any questions, comments, or suggestions!
